bike.description: C4 carbon w/ integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: S (44cm), S/M (47cm), M (50cm), M/L (53cm), L (55cm), L/XL (58cm)

components.description: C4 carbon thin seat stays, oversized chainstays, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 330 aero alloy, 30mm rims, DT Swiss Champion spokes 20/24H, precision ground hubs
Oval 500 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia XR w/ FeC alloy rails
